blog.content:
In October, 22 MSM group employees trekked for 6 days and successfully completed the Inca Trail to Machu Picchu. Racking up 162,154 steps and completing 76 miles past snow covered mountains, over mountain passes, through Peruvian jungle and up and down seemingly endless stone steps with 1000 foot drops to one side!

It’s not been without its difficulties either, 2 days being combined into one due to bad weather, camping through an electrical storm high up in the mountains waking everyone up and 1 am, high temperatures, rain, sleet, snow, tents getting flooded thanks to heavy rain, passing through viper territory and tarantulas in tents escaping the rain! This has challenged us mentally and physically and I would probably do it again :)

meta.author: Jamie De Rycke
meta.description: In October, 22 MSM group employees trekked for 6 days and successfully completed the Inca Trail to Machu Picchu. Racking up 162,154 steps and completing 76 miles past snow covered mountains, over mountain passes, through Peruvian jungle and up and down seemingly endless stone steps with 1000 foot drops to one side!

blog.title: Inca trail complete

blog.content:
In October I'm going on another MoneySuperMarket charity challenge to Machu Picchu Peru. Those of us who managed to get a spot on the trip needs to raise some money and train for the trip. The fund raisng can either asking family, friends and co-workers nicely or doing things like bake sales, raffles or car washes (we did one the other week, the weather held out for us :)).

Anyway all of our training and group fundraising events will be cataloged here: https://msmgroupcharitychallenge.com. I was asked to build the site which I did in Wordpress as others from the group will also be adding blog posts and events. The theme is custom and based on Bones.

Oh yeah, you can sponsor me here: uk.virginmoneygiving.com/jamiederycke.

meta.author: Jamie De Rycke
meta.description: In October I'm going on another MoneySuperMarket charity challenge to Machu Picchu Peru. You can follow our training and fund raising exploits here

blog.title: Something I've been working on...

blog.content:
After a leaving my website and blog alone for quite a while I decided I need to give them a new year refresh, nothing major....yet.

One thing was to try and bring the design a look of both inline as the landing page is plain html and the blog part is Wordpress. So I made my Wordpress theme use sass so I could copy the shared styles from one to the other without having to convert it back to css every time.

I changed the function of the menu on mobile as the page slide was a bit clunky so it's now a vertical dropdown rather than a horizontal slide and closes when you select an option.

I'm slowing converting the class names to BEM (Block Element Modifier), I use it this naming convention work and I'm still unsure about it. Maybe it just takes time to get your head around :/

I hope you like it.

meta.author: Jamie De Rycke
meta.description: After a leaving my website and blog alone for quite a while I decided I need to give them a new year refresh, nothing major....yet.

blog.title: Long over due update

blog.content:
So errmmm......yeah.

I've signed up for another MoneySuperMarket charity challenge. This time trekking the Inca Trail in Peru, specifically the Salkentay trail to Machu Picchu. It will take about 6-7 days of walking with a max altitude of 5000m and 20 people. Taking place in early October just before the rainy season starts, great :)

This time we are raising money for Shelter. You'll be able to sponsor me here if you wish.

Wish us luck, I'll try and keep you updated on here about my training and any other developments about the trip.

meta.author: Jamie De Rycke
meta.description: MSM will be trekking the Salkentay trail to Machu Picchu, Peru in October 2017 raising money for Shelter

blog.content:
A team of MSM employees, myself included successfully sumitted 4 4000m peaks in Morocco in 8 days :)

Raising £38,000 for the National Autistic Society. Thanks to all who sponsored and supported us.

You can see the video of the trip here

image.caption: Summit of Mt Toubkal - High Atlas Mountains, Morroco

meta.author: Jamie De Rycke
meta.description: A team of MSM employees, myself included successfully sumitted 4 4000m peaks in Morocco in 8 days :)

blog.title: 4 4000m peaks sumitted!

blog.content:
After the success of last years charity challenege (Kilimanjaro 2014), MoneySuperMarket are doing another one this time raising money for the National Autistic Society.

And yes, I have put my name down again :S

'On the 3rd June 2015, myself and a team of MSM crazies will the High Atlas Three Peak Challenge in Morocco.

The challenge is to summit the 3 highest peaks in the Atlas Mountain range, Mt. M’Goun (4068m), Mt. Ouankerim (4089m), and the highest mountain in North Africa Mt. Toubkal (4167m).

The trek will take 9 days which includes over 70hrs of walking at altitude and will be done in high temperatures with total ascent climbed of 6300m, 400m higher than the height of Mt. Kilimanjaro (5895m).

All money raised will go directly to The National Autistic Society as the travel costs have been paid for by myself and MSM. I really appreciate all your support and thank you for any donations.

Sponsor me here'

meta.author: Jamie De Rycke
meta.description: After the success of last years charity challenge (Kilimanjaro), MoneySuperMarket are doing another one this time raising money for the National Autistic Society.

blog.title: Another charity challenge

blog.content:
A picture for World Elephant Day 2015 http://worldelephantday.org/.

This one was taken during a safari in the Ngorongoro crater, Tanzania. There were a group at the roadside on the way to out campsite on the edge of the carter. This one didn't seem to like us watching too much and may have been protecting the little one in the long grass next it.
